participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate, Emily finds joy in cooking for her loved ones and cherishes her friendships.
participant_1.background: My mom is my biggest inspiration, and I'm grateful for my friends who have stayed by my side. I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely. I have to take allergy medication every time I grill for my family, but it's worth it because they love my food. I am obsessed with my dog. I hate skiing.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Liam pursues his passions with enthusiasm and enjoys exploring the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I made my first movie when I was 18. My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby. My favorite band is Bon Over. I was born completely deaf.

content.text: What's something you're really passionate about?
I've been passionate about archery for years!
That's really cool! What got you into it?
My parents are both archers, and I started when I was really young.
That's really cool! What do you like most about it?
I love the challenge of it, and I also love the outdoors.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have something you're passionate about.
What's your favorite thing to do in the outdoors?
I love to go camping and hiking.
That's really cool! I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm definitely going to have to try it sometime.
